# <a name="insert-a-picture-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="275aa-102">Umetanje slike u programu Outlook na Webu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="275aa-102">Insert a picture in Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="275aa-103">Ako želite da dodate sliku koja prikazuje u telu e-pošti, umetnutu sliku možete da dodate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="275aa-103">If you want to add an image that displays in the body of your email, you can add an inline image.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="275aa-104">Potvrdite izbor u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="275aa-104">Select the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="275aa-105">**Umetanje slike umetnute** u donjem delu okna za pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="275aa-105">**Insert pictures inline** at the bottom of the compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="275aa-106">Potražite lokaciju slike na vašem računaru, izaberite ga, a zatim izaberite **Otvori**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="275aa-106">Browse to the location of the picture on your computer, select it, and then select **Open**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="275aa-107">Da biste saznali o drugim načinima da biste personalizovali svoju poruku, da vidim [Prilagodi poruku e-pošte u programu Outlook na Webu](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="275aa-107">To learn about other ways to personalize your message, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
